name: Tweet Treats - Birdseed Ornaments - Set of 7
description:
Tweet Treats - High Quality Birdseed Ornaments to hang in your tree. Spectacular colors really pop!!

Eggs are solid seed for the birds to enjoy for days!!

This listing is for a set of Treat Tweets in the colors shown, if you want other color combinations, send me an e-mail and I will work with you on your purchase.

name: Lichen Love - Moss Terrarium - Great Woodland Gift Idea - Home Decor - Green it UP!
description:
Beautiful moss and lichen terrarium!!

This little guy measures 4 x 4 inches and is packed with super green mosses, lichens, and even some lichens attached to some bark!!

A great conversation piece!! A little garden in a jar!

Very easy to care for, care sheet included!! Mist every few weeks with water and leave be!!

Packaged for safe delivery!!

name: Bird's Nest Pendant - Sterling Silver - Freshwater Pearls - Free Shipping within the United States
description:
Gorgeous little bird's nest pendant!!

I love this piece....it's cute and get's me in the mood for spring!


Simple sterling silver bird's nest design is hand wrapped by me (each one is unique!). I use Champagne colored freshwater pearls for this piece, but I will be happy to custom design one for you in your choice of colors.

This item does not include a chain, but one can be added for you...just send over a message and we will work it out.

name: Red Mushroom Moss Terrarium
description:
Hello and thank you for looking!! All of my moss terrariums make great gifts for YOU, or for someone else. They are all hand crafted at the time of order, and will be shipped straight to your door, and always packaged for safe delivery!!

Moss is a plant that ANYONE can grow. You will find it in nature growing in shady, magical places. It is a plant that needs very little care or attention.

All of my mosses are home grown and native to the US. They come from my moss farm and are all hand cultivated by ME!!

Do you remember learning about the weather cycles in Science Class? Condensation, Evaporation, and all that good stuff?? The terrarium environment creates it’s own little ecosystem, recycling the moisture in the jar by processes of Evaporation and Condensation. Once a terrarium is established, it will thrive for a very long time with little to no attention.

Moss terrariums make great gifts, and people love to get them. It’s like their own little secret world contained in a jar. With an addition of some terrarium art (sold separately in some cases) , each terrarium can really be personalized for anyone.

With my 15 + years in the Horticultural Field, I have been around lots of plants….none of them are as whimsical, or magical as moss. I love growing it and am constantly amazed at how easy it is to grow, and how great it looks!!

Super Cute care tag is attached to each moss terrarium, and makes for great gift presentation.

Add green to your workspace or home! Very little effort is required for upkeep. With the lid in place and bright, indirect light peering through, there’s minimal watering necessary.

Terrarium measures 5 x 5 x 5 1/2 inches. Cute mushroom included!

If you have any questions, please ask!!

name: Moss Terrarium Kit - DIY - Glass Not Included
description:
How cute!! Do you love the look of moss terrariums, but have that artistic flair and want to make it yourself?? Well, here you go...everything you need to make a super sweet moss terrarium of your own

Moss Terrarium Kit includes:
Approximately 20 square inches (4” x 5) of Live Moss
Easy care instructions and planting guide
Super cutie moss nest accent
Stones, soil, activated charcoal & all other ingredients necessary to build a fantastic moss terrarium of your own (without the container)

All you need to add is your artistic charm!

Should you need more than 4” by 6” of moss for other projects, let me know and I can make a custom listing for you. Also, convo me if you have any special requests.

Would you like different types of moss? Only one type of
moss? let me know, I have 4-5 different types growing right now and can hopefully find the one you want!

If you have any questions about moss, or any plants for that matter, send a message, Ive been in the horticultural industry for over a decade and can probably help you out!

Thanks for looking!!!

This is in response to the overwhelming number of people that wanted one of my moss kits, but without the container!! Save on shipping and get more of the goodies!

***** Please note: mosses will be shipped in a ziploc bag to save on space and shipping!! *****
